entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
